events.message: build: Fix "ERR: Unsigned tarballs do not exist"

events.body: ACK 7762c5683f91a066cf833a19e7c0153942395cb1 - this should have been a part of #24549.

ACK 7762c5683f91a066cf833a19e7c0153942395cb1
Needed to make exactly this change before the codesign attachment worked.
I ran into the same error. Can I just apply this patch and continue guix-attest, or do we need a new RC?
I guess not, because guix will think I'm trying to build a random commit instead of a release. Anyway, this would confuse too many other signers.
Applying this patch _after_ building the binaries but _before_ code signing worked for me.
